snippet.title: Infinity Girl: A New Rhythm/Racer/Roguelite for fans of Thumper, Necrodancer, Bit.Trip and Rez
snippet.description:
Infinity Girl is a high-speed rhythm/racer/roguelite where everything — every action, every enemy and every spectacular world you encounter — is driven by the beat of the music. Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1828280/Infinity_Girl/

Infinity Girl is for fans of Thumper, Crypt of the Necrodancer, Bit.Trip Runner, Rez, 140, Just Beats & Shapes and other hypnotic rhythm games. Each run is unique, with procedural levels that test your skills as you grind, drift, boost and leap to the rhythm. Get into a flow and blast through levels at blistering speeds, gettin game-changing abilities along the way. 

Features:
-Tight, expressive controls tied to every beat
-A hypnotic and procedurally generated electronic soundtrack
-Vibrant cel-shaded art and surreal, music-driven visuals
-Dodge obstacles and take down enemies that move to the rhythm
-Powerful abilities and upgrades that transform every run
-Pick up items that slow time, turn you into a wrecking ball or give you the power of flight
-Challenge modes and achievements that reward mastery and make the game highly replayable
-Race to The Orb™ before time runs out (and this world is destroyed)
